p: Furthermore, according to Ogunwande et al. [ 33], there is a qualitative or quantitative expressive difference in essential oil composition from different botanic parts of Cedrela species. The authors affirmed that sesquiterpene hydrocarbons are present in the essential oil of leaves, while oxygenated derivates are predominant in steam bark essential oil. The sesquiterpenes ( 33â€“ 118) identified in the genus Cedrela are shown in Table 5.
